snippet: Other owners often look at Fred Warmbier in disbelief when he says he’s not interested in spending a lot of time trying to figure out health coverage. It’s a look that says, “Man, you HAVE to manage this closely! What is wrong with you?...
abstract: Other owners often look at Fred Warmbier in disbelief when he says he’s not interested in spending a lot of time trying to figure out health coverage. It’s a look that says, “Man, you HAVE to manage this closely! What is wrong with you? You’re leaving money on the table.”

headline.main: How I Learned to Stop Stressing Over Health Insurance
